column1: '''''torech''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word glossed as "tunnel; hole, excavation",<ref name=UI>{{HM
column2: UI}}, p. 490</ref> and "secret hole, lair".<ref name=PE17>{{PE

column1: The word ''torech'' is a derivative of the [[Sundocarme
column2: root]] TOR ("secrete, hide"). An associated word is [[Quenya]] ''[[ekka]]''.<ref name=PE17/>
